resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107784</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107784</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206109</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Walk Through Time</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Weg Durch Zeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une Promenade Par Le Temps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma Caminhada Com O Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una Camminata Con Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας περίπατος μέσω του χρόνου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una Caminata Con Tiempo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">looks at the evolution of timekeeping?how humans have measured the passage of time throughout history. The site describes and shows depictions of ancient calendars, sun and water clocks, mechanical and quartz clocks, and world time scales and time zones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blicke auf die Entwicklung der timekeeping?how 
Menschen haben den Durchgang der Zeit während der Geschichte 
gemessen. Die Site beschreibt und zeigt Beschreibungen der alten
Kalender, der Sonne- und Wassertaktgeber, der mechanischen und 
Quarztaktgeber und der Weltzeitskalen und der Zeitzonen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les regards à l'évolution des humains de 
timekeeping?how ont mesuré le passage du temps à travers l'histoire.
Le site décrit et montre des descriptions des calendriers 
antiques, les horloges du soleil et de l'eau, les horloges mécaniques
et de quartz, et les échelles de temps du monde et les fuseaux 
horaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os olhares na evolução de seres humanos do 
timekeeping?how mediram a passagem do tempo durante todo o history. 
O local descreve e mostra depictions de calendários antigos, 
pulsos de disparo do sol e da água, pulsos de disparo mecânicos e de
quartzo, e escalas de tempo do mundo e zonas de tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli sguardi allo sviluppo degli esseri umani del 
timekeeping?how hanno misurato il passaggio di tempo attraverso la 
storia. Il luogo descrive e mostra i depictions dei calendarii 
antichi, orologi dell'acqua e del sole, orologi del quarzo e meccanici
e scalette temporali del mondo e zone di tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει την εξέλιξη των ανθρώπων timekeeping?how 
έχει μετρήσει τη μετάβαση του χρόνου καθ' όλη τη διάρκεια της 
ιστορίας. Η περιοχή περιγράφει και εμφανίζει depictions 
των αρχαίων ημερολογίων, των ρολογιών ήλιων και ύδατος, των 
μηχανικών και ρολογιών χαλαζία, και των παγκόσμιων χρονικών 
διαστημάτων και των χρονικών ζωνών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">las miradas en la evolución de los seres humanos 
del timekeeping?how han medido el paso del tiempo a través de la 
historia. El sitio describe y muestra pinturas de calendarios 
antiguos, los relojes del sol y del agua, los relojes mecánicos y del
cuarzo, y escala de tiempo del mundo y las zonas de tiempo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206109</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107784</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/a-walk-through-time</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
